I Guess We're Grown-Ups Now
29: A Bad Bargain With An Elf
Published Dec 30, 2016
Hosted by Kari Halsted and Brook Shelley
Brook and Kari discuss children and not having them, how to get one if you need one, life scripts, undermining parents, pets and how having them is and isn’t like having kids. Brook’s cat makes us laugh and we try to describe it. Great radio.

105: Jonathan Stark — Charging Clients What You're Actually Worth
Published Feb 07, 2017
Hosted by Christopher Schmitt
The author of Hourly Billing is Nuts, Jonathan Stark, joins us to about charging clients what your worth or, what could be more beneficial, charging what the work is worth to your clients.
